title: Unit 3 Checkpoint: Composite, Implicit, Inverse Derivatives
description: Test + mixed no-calculator drills. Covers chain rule, implicit differentiation, inverse function derivatives, inverse trig derivatives, and higher-order derivatives.

remediationStrategy.description: Students scoring below threshold receive focused reteaching before Unit 4 (Applications of Differentiation).

clusters.reteachFocus: Identifying outer/inner, chain rule with trig/exp/log, nested compositions
dy/dx on all y-terms, product rule with xy terms, solving for dy/dx
(f⁻¹)'(a) = 1/f'(f⁻¹(a)), inverse trig derivatives with chain rule

assessmentProblems.question: Differentiate: g(x) = e^(√x) · ln(x²+1).
assessmentProblems.answer: Product rule + chain rule: g'(x) = e^(√x)·(1/(2√x))·ln(x²+1) + e^(√x)·(2x/(x²+1)).

assessmentProblems.question: Find dy/dx for x² + y³ = xy + 7.
assessmentProblems.answer: Differentiate: 2x + 3y²·(dy/dx) = y + x·(dy/dx). Collect: 3y²·(dy/dx) - x·(dy/dx) = y - 2x. dy/dx = (y-2x)/(3y²-x).

assessmentProblems.question: Find the slope of the tangent to x²+y²=25 at the point (3, 4).
Find f''(x) for f(x) = x·eˣ.
assessmentProblems.answer: f'(x) = eˣ + x·eˣ = eˣ(1+x). f''(x) = eˣ(1+x) + eˣ = eˣ(2+x).

assessmentProblems.question: If s(t) = t³ - 6t² + 9t + 2 represents position, find: (a) velocity, (b) acceleration, (c) when the particle is at rest.
SPIRAL: Find lim(x→0) (e²ˣ - 1)/(sin x) using L'Hôpital's Rule.
